content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i went walking on october 1, between the hours of 8:45pm and 10:00 pm with our two dogs.  we were traveling west on bancroft rd across bourland rd onto norma headed to the intersection of norma and johnson rd.  

exiting the subdivion of harmonson farms, we were directly in front of a singular horse/farm property located between harmonson farms and keller harvell schooll.   i notice a a blue light directly ahead of us in the sky, towards main st. keller and then noticed several more large blue lights around the initial light.  the light/orb seemed zig zag in random pattern.  it seemed to brighten and then disappear then appear in another place.  this cobalt blue looking sphere would seem to change into a lighter violet color and back again, and it seemed to be in relation to the size of a commercial jet in the sky, about 2x the size of the jets lights.  not small by any means.  

these were also with smaller bright white, orange, and red more starlike orbs that seemed to be swimming or flocking like fish or birds.   at one point one white orb seemed to abruptly stop right over us as i mentioned it seemed to see us.  i videotaped most of the event on my iphone, which caught some pretty incredible footage. 

the groups of  lights moved appx. 10 miles across keller, crossing hwy 377 and moving nw towards roanoke.  we lost sight of them as they moved beyond the tree line and house we were looking at.  my mother lives on the w side of 377 so i called her and told her to go look outside and she came back to the phone reporting much of the same as we had witnessed appx. 4 - 5 miles away.  she said she thought the lights were acting like magnets, pushing and pulling at each other.  

viewing the footage on our computer - we left original copy on iphone,  it seems as if the objects morph in and out of each other or interact with each other. they rate of speed is quite alarming and at incredible angles.  

once home, we were sitting on couch talking about the event, very stressed over saw and heard a very loud squeaking sound out of our open back window.  the sound was like a chirp of a fire alarm needing its batteries replaced.  

the next morning talking with my mother she told me she was awakened at appx. 3:00 am. by a squeaking sound outside of her house.  she said it seemed to travel around her house.  i had not told her we had heard that sound yet.
content.summary: Multi colored orbs over keller tx

content.detailedDescription: On october 1, 2011 my son and i were at our ranch north of brady texas and south of brownwood texas. we were sitting outside listening to the texas vs iowa state football game on the radio and watching the stars. it was a clear sky. from about 8:30 pm to 8:50 pm in the northern sky towards brownwood there were approximately 15 small bright white lights like strobe lights on airplane tail sections blinking in the night sky, but they were stationary or barely moving.  then 4 larger bright yellow-orange lights(vertical the first time, then horizontal each time after)  came on for approximately 10-15 seconds.  these lights came on about 4 different times.  all of the small blinking lights were scattered around in no discernible pattern. the last time we saw the bigger lights they had moved about 10 degrees to the west.  then very suddenly all of the lights were gone and we heard the sound of a large jet engine for a few seconds and it faded away to total quiet. we know that there are some air force bases nearby and had heard the sound of jet engines several times during the day light hours, but could never spot a plane in the sky.
content.summary: 4 bright yellow-orange lights for 10 - 20 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I am an auto claims adjuster for an auto insurance company.
i drive daily aprox. 100- 250 miles per day.
i was in greencastle indiana at the marathon gas station at st. rd. 40,
& st. rd 231, greencastle. met a customer there, wrote the estimate, then proceeded to drive south on st. rd. 231 to get back on i-70 east.
i was driving south on st. rd. 231 south, aprox 3-5 miles before hitting the exit for i-70. out of the left corner of my eye, i saw a bright, silver, disc shaped object that appeared stationary in the sky.
the object was located to the south east of my position as i was driving south on 231, toward i-70.  
i would guess that the object was pretty close to the indianapolis
international airport at the time of my sighting.
i am prior air force special ops, and prior commercial air line jet mechanic. at first, i thought the object could possibly be a plane that had a polished stainless steel fuselage. as i continued to view the object, it was not moving, had no noticable wings of any type, and was very bright. there were little to no clouds in the sky at the time.
the more i looked, the more i realized that i have never seen an object like this, no markings, just a bright perfect disc shaped object that left no vapor trail, and was not moving around. it just sat there in the sky.
as i contined to watch the object, it suddenly just disappeared.
it did not move off in any direction, it simply vanished.  
i thought to myself, holy ****, that was a freakin ufo.
the first thing i did was call my wife. i explained it to her, and she then confessed that she had seen the exact same thing some time ago.
i aksed her why she never told me?, and she said that she thought maybe she was just seeing things, and really didn't want to believe what she saw was a ufo.
content.summary: Bright silver polished disc stationary in the sky, then it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Sept 29th, 2011

call logs indicate that this sighting occurred at 7:48 pm as i called my girlfriend repeatedly in a frantic state.

i was traveling northbound on i-17 coming into black canyon city. there is an area where the valley is in full view as the interstate seems to be at a slightly higher altitude. being slightly familiar with the area, i was aware that there are mountains and hills in the area surrounding black canyon city, and that the interstate travels through them. coming into the area i noticed a series of red blinking lights that seemed to be ���hanging��� in the distance. my first thoughts were radio tower lights. the way they were ���scattered��� made me think that they were radio towers each positioned atop mountains. as i approached the first blinking red light i became a little suspicious as it was noticeably low, about 50 ft. i then noticed that the first light was not a tower, and not on top of a mountain, but above the interstate itself. i looked to the left and right of it to see if there were any wires that could be hanging this light blinking object, but concluded that there wasn���t. as i approached the object i could tell that it would blink red, and then green, and that it was literally hovering and not a moving object with absolutely nothing underneath, above, or around it. it was simply a blinking red/green light. i kept my eyes fixated on the object as i drove under it, and noticed that the blinking light wasn���t visible from underneath, and that there was an area of ���black��� around it blocking my view from the sky. i���m unsure as to how large the object was considering i was traveling at approx 75 mph. possibly more considering it scared the heck out of me. i approached about 4 more blinking lights and each were hanging off the road, and not directly above me.  they were all within a 5 mile radius, and along the interstate, and had about a mile distance between each other, and each hovering at about a 50 feet, maybe 75 feet high (or low). 

oct 2nd 2011,

call logs indicate this sighting occurred at 10:03 pm.

i was traveling southbound from flagstaff to tucson on i-17 through the same area that i had witnessed the initial sightings, and found zero lights in the general area of black canyon city. as i was approaching tucson, in the town of marana, i noticed in the distance a radio tower. being so aware of the red blinking lights, i became fixated on this tower. i noticed it blinking, and to the left, another red blinking light, this one off rhythm of the tower lights, and occasionally blinking a green blip. i couldn���t believe it. i approached the tower and other blinking light and confirmed that it was the same light i was seeing the wednesday before. this time the light was hovering above the interstate but slightly to the west, therefore i wasn���t able to drive directly under it. i was able to indicate that the shape of the light was a square, but it seemed to be wrapped around an object, making the object seem tube like, but vertical. again, this object was low, about 75 feet off the ground, and about 50 feet from me. it  seems as though this particular object was more of an observant object as it simply didn���t move. just blinked.
content.summary: Red/green blinking lights

content.detailedDescription: I was going out into my back garden it was 12.07am as i got to the french windows i saw 2 white lights coming towards me which was unmistakably an aircraft then out of the corner of my left eye i saw a red glowing ball crossing from my left to my right i opened the door and went out to stand on the steps the aircraft was just audible  focussed on the red ball the aicfaft noise was gone and then silence the object was bright red with a yellowish tinge and seemed to waver around the edge i thought it might be a chinese lantern but it moved at around 20-30mph flew in a straight line certainly not something i had seen before i am under the fight path of heathrow inbound and outbound gatwick outbound and london city inbound so i am used to seeing aircraft i felt privilidged to be seeing this and went to bed after the event i lost sight of the object as it passed into the distance over rooftops heading in the direction of canary wharf and city airport
content.summary: 12.07 am red glowing ball flew silently from my left to right 2 white lights of aircraft flying higer straight in my direction

content.detailedDescription: Not much to discraibe a fiu light on the sky very far last night was a very very clear sky night me an my neibor was shutin **** out said araund 9 and we note a light moving fast very far away in  the sky so we kep on looking n falowd the light than sdenly 2 more light show below the other one but this ones desapierd quikly so we stop talkin n staid just looking @ the sky n we so a fw more this was b twin 9:15 to 11 @ night it was realy weard....
content.summary: Raund light on the east said of town

content.detailedDescription: At 11:00 p.M. i went out on my balcony and saw little orange balls of light flying across the sky very fast. then i saw a big v-shaped craft appear out of thin air and go across the sky very slowly.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orbs over lake followed by v-shape very low

content.detailedDescription: I was delivering pizzas on sunday the 2nd of october in flower mound tx driving north on fm 2499 at 12:18pm.It was a totally cloudless day in north texas and nothing in the sky besides the normal dfw airport traffic which i am used to when over the horizon i see a group of objects,round in shape and highly reflective in the bright sun.They seemed to hover motionless many miles away.When suddenly as when a school of sardines turns to there sides in the ocean and change color,the objects seem to turn and disappear.I thought this was just my eyes playing a trick on me when i rolled up to the stop light at fm 2499 and fm 3040 a couple of seconds later, then the objects all in unison turned back reflecting the sun and becoming visible again.Awestruck i sat there and watched them move all in unison a 1/4 of a mile or so and then turn,all in unison again,and disappear once again.This repeated itself one more time and then after the last time they were visible,they were gone for good.It really shook me up,but the fear quickly faded away and now i am in wonder for what these objects were and where they came from.I tried to tell myself they were birds at first,because the way they moved gave them them the appearance of being living creatures,not metal objects.But this simply cannot be the case.These objects were perfectly round in shape disappeared into thin air all in unison.Its been almost 24 hours now and i still cant believe i actually saw this.
content.summary: Strange objects in the sky that disappeared and reappeared several times.

content.detailedDescription: We were at a cancun mexico resort hotel pool side on lounge chairs watching the stars at around 9:30pm. the sky was clear with a few cloud and a rising full moon. we saw what appeared to be a shooting star cross the sky from south to north at a high rate of speed. approximately 3 minutes later a second "light" appeared at the same speed and direction, both disappeared behind clouds. approximately 5 minutes later a third "light" appeared going at same speed and direction, however this one made a right hand u turn without slowing down and returned in the same direction that it had come. a fourth "light" appeared approximately 3 minutes later going in a west to east direction. it appeared to be the same color, size, distance and traveling at the same rate of speed. the "lights" did not slow down, change color, blink or make a sound. to compare their speed to airplanes we also saw; airplanes took 20 to 30 seconds to disappear, the "lights" took only a few seconds to cross the sky. the "light" that made the u turn did not change color or fade as it turned, the orange light remained constant as it made the turn. if this "light" had not made the u turn, we would have believe we had seen shooting stars or possible space junk burning up. now, we are not sure what we have seen, except that i have never seen anything make a high speed turn without slowing down as this object did nor do i believe shooting stars change direction.
content.summary: Four orange lights moving acroos sky at high speed. two in straight line, one along same path but made a u turn, one crossing previous paths at 90 degree angle.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of sat oct 1st 2011 i was in brownwood tx visiting with friends and family. there was approximately 15 of us outside when we noticed 3 vertical bright orange lights appear in the sky. these lights stayed on for maybe 30-45 seconds and vanished. in the mean time there were many white blinking lights flying all over the sky. at first we wrote that off as commercial aircraft in the sky, but we quickly realized that these lights were flying way to erraticly and dimming in and out until they couldnt be seen anymore. shortly after that we hear this loud thunderous roar above our heads as if something was flying right over us. it definately was unlike any other aircraft ive ever heard before, it was almost ear piercing. a few seconds more pass by and we see the orange lights appear again but this time in a different area of the sky. they remained vertical for a few seconds and then started moving around as if they were conforming to a shape. but as quick as they started doing that they faded out and were never seen again for the rest of the night. another 10-15 mins passes and we all start to hear noises again in the sky, but this time i was familiar with it. a military chinook helicopter passes overhead but as if it was looking for something. i guess ive never really been a believer of the extraterrestrial but this has been bothering me for a couple days now since we all saw this. i guess more than anything im just looking for answers and possibly explanations as to what we all witnessed.
content.summary: Orange lights in the sky over brownwood tx

content.detailedDescription:
9/28/11-near bridgeport, ca,- approx. 9:30 pm. blm land, no moon, very dark, fantastic sky, lots of universe to see. looking up, i saw a very bright, white light in the sky, which i figured was a star or planet. as i continued to look, i noticed it moving/bobbing, then be still. it appeared to have a single bright, white light, front & center. there was a lot of glare, so i squinted my eyes, attempting to ascertain the shape/size. appeared semi-circular, silver metallic, non-smooth with some type of pattern. moved to a better location, the object hovered, at times bobbed/moved. a few hours later, noticed 6-8 circular objects, with flashing multi-colored lights over the horizon in all four directions. the bright white object in the center. then, saw multi-colored, flashing lights approach from ne, much lower on the horizon, actually lighting up the ground. this object ascended, became pale blue & hovered around the same altitude as the white object, facing each other, where they remained until dawn. once it was light out, both objects began to slowly ascend until they could no longer be seen. the white object went se; the blue object ne. 
this was a surreal, yet very real, event that left me in pure amazement, esp. since i had seen the objects in the daylight.

9/29/11 - 10/3/11 - carson valley, nv - the same white object has appeared at approx. 10 pm pst, sw sky, the multi-colored, flashing objects are off to the east. ascends slowly at dawn until it disappears out of sight. they are out there right now (10/3 - 3:25 am pst). i counted 5 of the multi-colored objects, which are in line/formation from n to s. unfortunately, i have no video/photos.  

surely, others have witnessed this over the past week. i've never seen anything like it, esp. remaining in one spot & disappearing at daybreak. any ideas? any other reports? thank you.
content.summary: Bright white light, metallic body, mostly hovered for 8 hours, accompanied by other crafts. slosly ascended into sky at dawn & until it disappeared from sight.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my friends party when one of the children noticed some unusual green lights in the sky. at first i thought they must have been from a plane or helicopter, but they were moving too slowly and seemed to form a perfect triangle. my friend got her phone out and started to record them. as she started recording they seemed to pulsate a few times before returning to a triangle and then to just two green lights. we watched the two lights glide over the city until we lost sight of them in the distance. i am still very confused about what we all saw, but i know for a fact that i have never seen anything like it in my life... i am submitting this footage on my friends behalf. i have also included a still image of the orbs in the triangle shape, as seen in the footage 23 seconds into the video.

i should also mention that the next day, i witnessed a big black helicopter to the west, in the direction that we saw the lights.

can anyone give me some answers about what we saw?
content.summary: Green orbs in triangle shape above phoenix

content.detailedDescription:
Star like events over mounths stay in place till i look at it then moves and light disapears, i know the events are not a faberatation, my wife has seen it aswell. i have seen ufo;s for years and i have a scare that i beleave was caused by a implant, with out knowing how i have it. i have some kind of conection with events, like i get up 3 am go out and see a event. it is as if they can not be radem events.
i asked for help as a kid to be taken by ufo people, and from age 8 i have had contact by site only, the objects called ufo;s, cegar shape dark in color bright orbes and what looks like stars.
content.summary: Star like hovering then movement short distance and disapears

content.detailedDescription: My hunting partner and i had arrived at the hunting lease at about 6am.  we were parked at the gate entrance of the deer lease when we began to observe the stars.  the morning was clear and the stars were very clear.  i had turned to look toward the north when we saw what we thought was a very bright planet.  the object began move and then disappeared.  i confirmed with my hunting partner that he witnessed the same thing.
content.summary: I was observing the morning stars in the country.  i thought i was looking at a planet when the object began to move &  get smaller until gone.

content.detailedDescription:
1. we were driving south on ormond rd. saw a glowing orange object to the west that seemed to be stationary at aprox 820pm just behind the tree line. then we turned west on to white lake rd. then object was still on our right side but seemed smaller and higher in the sky. we then turned south on ormond rd. object was behind us and seemed to be moving north. we lost sight and then spotted it moving south(twords us) until it was almost directly overhead.  we then stopped the car just north of jackson blvd. and watched the object slowly assend up until it suddenly vanished.  
2. i saw a large orange glow in the tree line.
3. i thought at first the top of a cell phone tower was on fire.
4. it looked like a orange dull glowing bubble. i would compare it to a harvest moon. it looked like it was stationary at first when i saw it through the trees. then we could see it was moving away from us then changed direction and came back tword us traveling in the same direction as us.  at this point we stopped the car to observe the object. we thought maybe it was a strange looking helicopter but when it got almost overhead we could hear nothing and could not see any lights a helicopter would normally have.  it then started assending upward, glowing as it passed in and out of some clouds and then suddenly vanished. 
5. we were very courious during the sighting, trying to figure out what we were seeing.  there were 6 of us in the car all seeing the same thing. there were other cars on the road but we were the only ones that pulled over. we could also see airplanes higher in the sky.
6. we were watching it and it just vanished.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large object tree top height started moving.

content.detailedDescription: Last night (oct. 1 2011); we,(my husband, myself and our 4 kids) were driving east bound on sr 60 courtney campbell bridge from clearwater towards tampa. we left our home a few minutes past 9pm, so this took place sometime between 9-10pm. as my husband drives i look up and there i see a "flying saucer" and although we were very close to the tampa airport (tpa) it took me a fraction of a second to realize this wasn't a plane, so i scream it out, look a flying saucer (in my native language; spanish) my husband immediately looks up, and is like omg what the... no...!? and he is laughing in disbelief... this thing was flying/hovering in the direction we were going a few hundred feet above us. it had clear or white lights flashing in a wave-like motion around its perimeter, and one red flashing light. my husband and i both got our cell phones out and recorded the thing, however, it was night time and a cell phone camera is not very potent after all, so unless someone has some sort of high-tech equipment that might be able to perhaps magnify it and see something, these videos are pretty much useless. but we do have them in case. we continued to see the ufo until it turned north (to our left) and then east again, but far from us. we stopped seeing it once we got onto the turning lane to get into the international plaza mall in tampa, fl.  i asked the kids ages 10 & 12 if they had seen it and they said they did. my 12 yr old especially gave me the exact description of what i had seen myself.  i want to mention that i had never seen anything like it in my life, and that for the record, i'm one if those people that do not believe in extraterrestrial aliens, area 51, or any of that stuff, but i know i saw this thing last night, as well as my kids and husband and unless it a new type of air force, military aircraft, i would say it was a "flying saucer".
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saucer-like ufo flying over courtney campbell bridge going east towards tampa, lights were clear, like waving around the saucer perimiter, there was one blinking red light. we stopped seeing it once we got to the international plaza mall.

content.detailedDescription: Around 9:00 p.M. i was taking my trash out to the street when i noticed what appeared to be a star. then i realized it was blinking or flashing so it could not have been a star. then i thought to myself that it must be a plane, so i watched it for about 15 or 20 minutes slowly move west then out of site. i believe if it had been a plane it would have moved away much more quickly than it did. what got my attention is the way the lights were flashing. they looked more like a christmas tree flashing off and on than a plane, which usually has a distinct green or red light with another strobe light flashing. this did not have that at all. and it was moving way too slow. very strange.
content.summary: I saw what i thought at first was a star, then noticed it was flashing. thought is was a plane but was moving too slow.

content.detailedDescription:
It was september 30th 2011 that my son and i plus others had a very unusual sighting, in a n.H. park the sighting happened between the hours of 4-5pm in the afternoon on a bright non windy day. i had just purchased a new phone the day prior, so the afternoon of the 30th at about 3:20pm my wife had left for work. my son and i had decided to go to the park about 30 minutes after my wife had left for work. the park is located directly in front of our apartment complex building so we walked over to the playground where there was three teenage girls, and a mother of two little children and her father,  i sat down on the farthest corner bench in the park playground and began playing around with the features on my new cell phone. 
    about 20 minutes later my son had approached me saying, ���daddy! there is something in the sky!��� and then he pointed in the direction of what it was he was talking about. i said oh ya, just shrugging off what he said at first but then i looked directly in the direction he was pointing and i saw just as it was passing the first set of tree branches, the tail end of a solid black object slowly floating away.  i then stood up and walked over to the other side of the playground where one of the three young teenagers was starring up at the object as well. i asked her immediately ���do you see that?��� she replied ���yes i do, what is that!��� i then turned and ran towards the object. it was moving very slow and in a straight direction while rotating counter clock wise, 
     i at first thought that it was a garbage bag or helium balloon just sailing across the sky at about 20-30 feet up in the air. i could see this object perfectly and began to realize it was neither a balloon or bag and their was no wind present at the time to push it, maybe at 100 feet or higher but not 20 or 30 feet. it seemed to be solid but with a natural type of texture to it(hard to explain its features exactly) and a apendage on each end and a antenna or rod of some kind in its center but at the same time it seemed like it was light as a feather by the way it was moving through the air with no shaking or wobbling of any kind and it gave off no sound what so ever. i have to admit my son saw it much better then i, after this incident accured i began to forget the objects exact features, but my son remembered it clearly and drew his own picture of the object and we compared. i have never been so freaked out in my life.
     the object was about 4 feet long by 2 ��� to 3 feet wide and i remember it was between 20-30 feet up in the air at first. if it was a remote controlled device it would have gave off a sound of some kind, being maybe fans or a motor but there was nothing! not even a hum. also it had no light reflection at all and the sun was pointing directly at the side of this object.  the sun was not blaring and there was some clouds but it was definitely a clear enough day for the sun to shed its rays and the sun was visible. you would think that a bag or helium balloon would at least give off a reflection of some sort. i had a hard time making out some of the exact details on the object, their was no perfectly smooth surfaces. 
     i then began to try to use my camera on my phone but i could not get to the video fast enough, by the time i unlocked the phone and searched the menu for the camera and started to film, the object raised itself higher and through the opening in the trees and just kept moving higher and higher in a angle but staying on the same straight course as it was originally till it was out of sight. i did not know how to use all the features on my phone so i could not even figure out the right button for the zoom. 
     i just want to add that the object was always moving in one straight path and the park is completely surrounded by closely tight trees at least 100 feet tall and this object found the one and only opening between the trees about 60 feet up and went through it with ease and all while staying on a straight path. (almost like its path was planned) by the time i started filming, the object was just a black spec on a bad phone camera video with lots of pixilation. (i do still have the video but it does not show much due to bad pixilation, go figure). i rushed from the excitement and just didn���t play my actions correctly, i would have ran after it to try and film it better but i would have been stranding my 7 year old son alone at a playground with strangers and i had to let it go. it���s  not everyday you see something like this and from now on i���m going to keep a good camera by my side. 
     i have added a illustration of the park and the object, i also placed a picture of a person (which is myself) so that you would know the scale of this object and the height it was at from the ground up. i wasn���t actually holding my camera up until the object began to exit through the tree opening. the funniest thing is that after all was said and done (which was about 3 minutes or so) everyone at the park no longer said a word about it and acted as if  nothing had just happened (including myself). but as the evening had went on that day it began to bug me and my memories the more i thought about it the more i lost visual on it but thanks to my son that just wouldn't let me forget about it i held on to the event. i think my brain was trying to play it off like it was a dream. i'm not sure who else saw it but the young girl i spoke to definately did and i will be asking the others if i see them. it boggles me that i didn't ask anyone else anything right after the incident.
     i have seen one other incident years prior but i just decided to pawn it off as a satelite due to it being so far away but now i'm reconsidering that decision. i'm done rationalizing everything, i have always been a religious person at heart and this incident has really freaked me out(although it did not scare me when i witnessed it, i was more in disbalief and excitment then anything), but my son was not freaked noir was he scared at the least then or now, i told him it was just a balloon so that he wouldn���t worry and even at the age of 7 he knows better, he just told me ���daddy i have seen balloons and i have never seen one like that,it had a antenna!.���
content.summary: 4 feet by 2.5-3 feet, slow moving, slow rotating, sloid mass black object. 20 to 30 feet above ground.

content.detailedDescription: My 8 year old son and i were sky watching when he pointed out a small white shiny circular object flying by a commercial jet. it was much higher than the jet and moved a lot faster too. after about 3 minutes it was out of our sight. then about 20 minutes later i seen a cigar shaped white ufo that was a lot closer to the ground than the other one. this one was flying in a straight path at first until it abruptly stopped, hovered for about 20 seconds and then completely vanished as if a bubble popping. it didn't fly away, it just disappeared completely!
content.summary: The ufo was flying by a jet above the clouds, then another flew by 20 min. later that hovered and then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from the store with 3 children in car. my 8 year-old son spotted it first and said "look at that in the sky" - i looked up and saw 3 birds and said to him "those are birds" - he said "no look right there" and at a second glance i spotted the object. we turned to go towards the object to get a better view. it was disc-shaped like a saucer or frisbee. it was close enough to see the colors - which was black on the bottom and white on top. it moved up and down and side to side in a tilting like motion. it was wierd. i thought what could that be. i immediately thought of my camera phone when it occured to me, i'd left it at home. we observed this for about 30 to 45 seconds. i told the kids to keep an eye on it while i headed home which was about 1 minute away. after arriving back at the sight within 3 minutes, it was gone. before we left the sight the first time, it appeared as it was going over the mountain in desert hot springs (not sure the name of the mountain but by joshua tree national park). i'm wondering if it was a man-made radio controlled object. it just seemed too large and far away to be controlled by a radio remote control.
content.summary: Disc-shaped, black bottom, white top, tilting back and forth

content.detailedDescription: This object loooks like a star. i have 30 picture. of object .When i zoom in on this you can see a ship looking thing.The pictures are taken times 12 zoom. the thing is there every night.
content.summary: Looks

content.detailedDescription: I had just walked by my security camaras when this orb or ghost or spirt flew into camaras vision . i never seen it till i played back the video the camara took . lots of ufo and orb type stuff flying around this house everyday since i pointed my two of my camars to the sky to try and catch that satelite that was suppose to break up on re-entry .
content.summary: Orb or spirt flying in my front yard , ridgecrest , ca.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside with coffee and it caught my eye in an otherwise absolutely clear sky, it was at an extremely high altitude but there was no reference point (clouds etc.) at first it looked like a star. but it was to early to in the day and i don't believe there are any visible this time of year until dusk. it would remain stationary for 10 minutes as i was speaking on the phone and describing it to my parents. eventually it began a moving in a stair-like pattern to the west slowly at first then increased in speed as it headed for the horizon. i was obviously confused because of the objects stationary position in the sky and then i have never witnessed a vehicle move this way in the sky. i lost sight of it over trees to the west very close to the horizon.
content.summary: Witnessed a stationary object for about 10 minutes then it began moving in a stair-like patern towards the west. then it was out of site.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i were talking late into the night about various topics when we were doing a divination concerning which constellation to ponder and meditate on. this ended up being pisces. so we walked out onto our pool deck after being in a pretty meditative mindset and directly above our neighbors house (from there you would be able to see the couch where we were sitting) we saw two star-like lights in a parallel formation which was slightly diagonal from the horizon. it was completely silent outside, and a perfectly clear night. this formation moved into the pisces constellation which was 60 degrees above the horizon. it moved at a medium pace, and at a steady velocity. the space between the two lights looked fuzzy and seemed interconnected. we immediately went to the backyard to try and see more of this somewhat eerie presence and a meteorite came flying by and then after a few minutes directly above the tip of pisces a blinking blue light appeared and stayed exactly in its position for nearly 45 minutes. the blinking was not consistent with its intervals; they ranged from split seconds to 30 seconds apart. again, it did not move.

very interesting.

this morning we read the other reports in the area about a boomerang-shaped ufo that were seen lats night, and they sounded very familiar.
content.summary: Two star-like lights hovered above our neighbors house and  then at medium speed and parallel formation went towards picses.

content.detailedDescription:
Meu nome ��� melsi maran, sou professor e quero compartilhar minha experi���ncia de avistamento de ovni, isso aconteceu no dia 21/02/2009, as 20 horas num sabado de carnaval,em minha casa de veraneio na cidade de ilha comprida litoral sul de s���o paulo,brazil, quando eu e meu filho de 26 anos estavamos sentados a beira da piscina observando as estrelas e os avi���es que passam a 10.000 metros no c���u, e derrepente ele olhou a oeste e me disse, l��� longe no horizonte oeste vem um outro avi���o e vem r���pido,olhei e disse n���o parece um avi���o, ��� uma luz branca opaca e vem muito r���pido e n��� existe rota em dire������o ao oceano, quando derrepente parou sobre n���s, sem ruidos a uns 5000 metros mudando de cor para o amarelo, depois laranja avermelhado e se fargamentou apagando, ficamos olhando e comentamos, isso n���o ��� daqui e se for vai cair sobre n���s, depois de um minuto apagado uma luz branca de grande intensidade reacendeu sem ruidos e sem chamas, projetando a nave numa incr���vel velocidade em dire������o ao cosmo, mais precisamente em dire������o ao centro da galaxia, clareando tudo por onde passava e sumindo como uma estrela em segundos.
foi uma experi���mcia inesquec���vel para min e meu filho que devemos divulgar para as pessoas saberem que estamos sendo obervados e isso ��� a pura verdade.
mel���si maran
content.summary: Tinha forma de circulo e luz branca opaca

content.detailedDescription: That is told to me by my friends. on 29.09.2011 about 19:49 they take picture of a five (5) lights that hovers in formation over nova zagora central square. they stood on a bench and talking, and suddenly they saw these lights in formation that drifted to the northeast and one of my friends captured them with his mobile phone.
content.summary: 5 lights, 3 of them in triangle formation 2 of them in the back side closed together.

content.detailedDescription: Was walking home from my girlfriends work and noticed smoke trail in sky. thought it was just airplane trails, then saw a small glowing orb buzzing back and forth in near 180 degree change of direction. i went and got my phone and filmed the object as well as took pictures. went out 20 minutes later there were two separate paths. went out 5 minutes later the orb vanished. in films you can hear one of my neighbors go omg!
content.summary: Orb travelled back and forth leaving criss cross smoke trails that turned into tiny loops and odd winged like trail

content.detailedDescription: Please go to my face book and observe a situation last saturday on a cell phone camera.  little back ground on me i am a industrial technologist.
content.summary: Lights in sky

content.detailedDescription:
My fiancee and i had went to the beach to celebrate his upcoming birthday (on the weekend, since his birthday falls on a weekday) and we were in our hotel room lounging on the bed with the patio door open observing the night sky and listening to the ocean when we both saw the same thing happen. we saw two star like objects ascend through the sky side by side going along the same path. it was almost like falling star except that they both went in the complete opposite direction, as if you were seeing stars fall in reverse only slower. it happened not slowly, and not fast and we didn't see any specific shape of the objects or notice anything odd about them except that they were definitely taking off and going upwards side by side from ground to sky in the eastern direction.

if we weren't laying there taking in the view, we never would have noticed it happen or have heard anything, so it was an extreme coincidence that we were able to see this.

both of us were pretty shocked and have been for the past few weeks. we've talked about it a few times and have finally decided to simply believe that we did in fact see two ufo's ascending into space, nothing else made sense at that distance, time, speed, or direction. so now that we've both accepted it we decided to report it to your company, in case there were others that saw it the same night as well.

we lost sight of the objects taking off together when they flew out of our range of sight from the doorway. i think both of us just kinda sat there dumbfounded for a few seconds before saying "did you see that?" and getting up to look out the patio doorway, only finding at that point there was nothing else in the sky except the stars. we sat there for about another hour staring at the sky until we just gave up and went to sleep.
content.summary: Saw two objects fly upward diagonally together into space

content.detailedDescription:
This was reported to me at 9:30pm, oct. 1, by a neighbor who wishes to remain anonymous.

"i was walking from my parked car to the back entrance of kohl's department store in havertown, when i noticed a very bright aerial light in my furthest right peripheral vision.  looking up, i saw what i thought at first to be many helicopters flying in three groups consisting of 1-to-four objects.  

the sky was overcast but it was not raining.  what startled me was that there was no sound at all.  there was very little sound from the parking lot and by-passing traffic.  i was by myself.

we live in a flight path, and are used to seeing and hearing various planes and helicopters at all times of day.  

i walked about 30-35 feet as i watched the objects, flying from wnw to the southwest...In the direction of the philadelphia int. airport.  during the time they were in sight, one of the lights in the middle grouping suddenly zipped from the group, joined the first group just slightly ahead of what had been its original front light.  the instant speed of the thing took me completely by surprise, at which point i looked to see if there was anyone else in the lot who might also be seeing this.  one woman was coming out of the store, but by that time, the objects were obscured by the facade of the store roofline.

i was shocked at the sight, but kept walking into the store to continue my errand, simply because i didn't know what else to do.  i reported this to a neighbor who has an interest in these things, and we did a sketch of the sighting."
content.summary: Straight-line flight, wnw-to-sw, of 3 groupings of lights, with one object  speeding up to join another group.
